conversations.agent:
🤖 TaskMaster Pro Help
========================================

I can help you manage tasks! Here's what I can do:

📝 **CREATE TASKS**
  • "Create a task to buy groceries"
  • "Add important task: Finish report"
  • "New task: Call mom (high priority)"

📋 **LIST TASKS**
  • "List all tasks"
  • "Show completed tasks"
  • "List high priority tasks"
  • "What tasks do I have?"

✅ **COMPLETE TASKS**
  • "Complete task_0"
  • "Mark the first task as done"
  • "Finish task_1"

🗑️ **DELETE TASKS**
  • "Delete task_2"
  • "Remove the shopping task"

📊 **STATISTICS**
  • "Show statistics"
  • "Get detailed report"
  • "How many tasks do I have?"

💬 **SYSTEM**
  • "help" - Show this message
  • "memory" - Show conversation history
  • "exit" - Exit the agent

💡 **EXAMPLES**
  • "Create a high priority task to finish the project"
  • "Show me all pending tasks"
  • "Complete the first task and show stats"

Mode: ⚡ Simple Command
Version: 2.0.0

   Me: Created important task...
2. You: List all tasks...
   Me: Here are your tasks......
